name: Stickman: Rescue Coco
description:
Stickman : Rescue Coco is a 2D  puzzle casual game, you will using every thing you have in game to rescue Coco .
Or you can troll stickman guy before rescue Coco :)

Control : 

Drag and Drop object to make a path for stickman move.

Challenge yourself with many difficult map ! Earn many skin for Coco ! Credits : 

Developer : HaDo

Publisher : Double Studio
